div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `CareTeam.participant.coverage[x]` has a context of CareTeam.participant based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `CareTeam`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 CareTeam to FHIR R4 CareTeam

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 CareTeam to FHIR R4.
